name: orange chicken
instructions: 1. In a small bowl, whisk together orange juice, soy sauce, honey, cornstarch, ginger powder, garlic powder, and red pepper flakes. Set aside.
2. Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper on both sides.
3. Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
4. Add the chicken breast to the skillet and cook for about 4-5 minutes on each side, until golden brown and cooked through.
5. Remove the cooked chicken from the skillet and set it aside.
6. Reduce the heat to low and pour the orange sauce into the skillet.
7. Stir the sauce continuously until it thickens, about 1-2 minutes.
8. Return the cooked chicken to the skillet and toss it in the sauce until evenly coated.
9. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes to allow the flavors to combine.
10. Remove from heat and serve the orange chicken hot.
description: Orange chicken is a delicious and tangy Chinese-inspired dish that features crispy chicken coated in a flavorful orange sauce.
